listing.listing_description:
Pelicans Pete and Patricia welcome visitors to their home—which lies just offshore from this wood-paneled residence on 200 feet of Turks and Caicos beachfront. The fully staffed villa is perfectly tailored to its setting, with 3 levels of terraces facing the ocean views. Step out to snorkel the manmade reef where the pelicans live and walk to local spots serving up fresh seafood and live music.

Get to know the pelicans, schools of fish, and the occasional stingray or turtle by taking the villa’s snorkeling equipment, kayaks, and stand-up paddleboards out for a spin. Back on the beach, start a game of beach tennis or volleyball or take a few laps of the heated swimming pool. Ask the chef to serve dinner at the alfresco dining area on the second-story deck, then head to the rooftop terrace to watch the sunset.

A recent renovation made this villa a modern take on the beach house—and gave it a little European flair. Stone walls and wood paneling echo the rock-dotted coast and native trees outside. Natural tones in the great room’s living and dining areas, plus a driftwood-hewn fixture over the breakfast bar in the fully equipped kitchen, bring the beach indoors.

The villa’s Thompson Cove location means you just need to snap on a mask and swim out to the reef for great snorkeling. But it’s also easy to reach more great beaches: Smiths Cove is a 10-minute drive, and Sapodilla Bay and Grace Bay are within 10 kilometers.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Cayuco 1 is a superb villa in the area of Punta Cayuco, along the luxurious western shore of the Dominican Republic near Cap Cana. Featuring beautiful views of the fifth hole of Punta Esperada Golf Course, the villa is situated just minutes from the first tee and from the beach at Caleton Beach Club. Combining exquisite traditional palapa structures with contemporary comforts and amenities, the villa features spectacular alfresco and indoor living areas as well as five deluxe bedrooms sleeping sixteen, perfect for families and destination wedding guests.

Hidden amid lush gardens and tall palms, the estate includes an exquisite pool terrace with ample space for luxuriating in the sun or shade. Savor sumptuous days in the Dominican sun and Atlantic breeze, bathing in the hot tub, floating in the delicious swimming pool, and sipping cocktails on stylish loungers. Enjoy an alfresco lunch in the palapa pavilion, and afternoon refreshments in the lounge. The ample terrace is perfect for entertaining guests, with lovely lighting that lets you linger deep into the night.

Wide glass doors open to the living and dining pavilion, where a sumptuous lounge and dining table set the stage for feasts and festivities. The high ceilings and open wall invite a lovely breeze into your evenings, while ceiling fans and central air keep you cool. From this pavilion, an enchanting alfresco pathway—flanked by luminous moats with palm trees in island planters—conveys you to the interior lounge, kitchen, and bedrooms suites.

The villa includes five bedrooms distributed on its two levels. The upper floor features the spectacular master suite with private terrace, as well as a guestroom with two queen beds and a balcony. The first floor includes a king bedroom and two rooms with two queens each, all opening directly to the pool terrace. All of the villa's bedrooms have ensuite bathrooms.

Cayuco 1 enjoys one of the finest locations in Punta Cayuco. In addition to serene seclusion, you'll enjoy outstanding proximity to Punta Espalda Golf Course (just a four-minute drive from your door) and Caleton Beach Club. You're also within a ten-minute walk of tennis courts and Golden Bear Lodge. Scape Adventure Park is ten minutes away by car, and Cap Cana Marina about fourteen minutes.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
The amenities of a premier resort meet the luxury of a private villa at Beach Enclave Oceanview Villa 8 - 5 Bedroom. Part of the exclusive Beach Enclave community, a ten-acre haven on Babalua Beach, this vacation rental gives you access to a full resort staff. Its indoor-outdoor living areas overlooking the water, however, are your very own retreat to enjoy with up to ten friends or family.

Your holiday at Beach Enclave includes the services of a concierge, villa manager, housekeeper/butler and recreation staff, as well as daily continental breakfast and activities such as group yoga classes. Take the provided golf cart to join the fun, or stay at the villa to lounge by the infinity pool, try out local seafood on the barbecue or sip wine at the al-fresco dining area. Other amenities range from Apple TV and Wi-Fi to a fitness room and wine fridge.

Set on nearly an acre of land 65 feet above sea level, the villa boasts panoramic views over the lush surroundings to the turquoise waters of the sea. And an open-plan great room fronted by slide-away glass doors means you can enjoy those views from the living area, dining area or even the breakfast bar in the fully equipped kitchen.

Each of the five bedrooms at Oceanview Villa 8 has a king bed and en-suite bathroom; most have ocean views, too. There are two bedrooms with honeymoon-suite-worthy features such as private balconies and al-fresco showers.

Turks and Caicos is known for its beaches’ postcard-perfect white sand and brilliant blue water. As its name suggests, Beach Enclave makes it easy to enjoy them, with Sunset Beach just a minute’s walk from the villa, and top-rated Grace Bay Beach and Long Bay Beach a short drive away. Don’t miss a visit to Princess Alexandra National Park, a pristine marine preserve teeming with wildlife.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Start the morning with a short kayak trip up the Leeward Canal, which runs alongside this lush estate in Turks and Caicos. Once you’ve made it back to the dock, head inside for a well-deserved breakfast at the alfresco dining set. Then spend the early afternoon working on your tan from a poolside lounger. For dinner, check out the waterfront restaurants a few minutes away in Grace Bay.

Located on the prestigious Leeward Canals, Villa Khaya stretches across a well-decorated garden estate finishing off at the shimmering blue waters. Three uniquely different hosting areas, the interior, pool deck, and riverfront, provide an incredible atmosphere for any occasion. Feel the cool breeze from the canal throughout the interior, thanks to floor-to-ceiling openings along the waterfront walls. Let the warm wood tones, soothing creams, and plush furnishings usher you into new levels of relaxation. When you’re ready to party, turn up the sound system and whip up a few tropical cocktails to sip in the gazebo by the river’s edge.

There are plenty of ways to keep active around Grace Bay. If you’d prefer to keep dry, shoot a round or two of golf at Provo, hike the trails at Chalk Sound National Park, or schedule a tennis match at the club 10-minutes away. On the water, you’ll find several beach areas within a 10-minute drive. Or, arrange a boat hire, fishing charter, or tour at Blue Haven Marina.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
La Favorita’s view dazzles the moment you enter the villa. Your eyes flow from the cool interior out to a stunning collection of blues. The horizon unites the cerulean pool and sapphire Caribbean with the rich azure sky.

The villa’s style is French Caribbean meets Moroccan. The fully air conditioned open plan great room is airy and white with vaulted ceilings. The interior’s multiple seating areas optimize the view. Stylish, comfortable furniture in pure white complements the exotic banquette backed by Moroccan arches. Dark woods and interesting object d’art add visual appeal. The elegant kitchen with high-end appliances opens to the view and the outdoor dining areas.

The outside spaces are beautifully detailed. A covered terrasse surrounds the pool while palm filled planters; terrace plantings and a huge palm soar through the sun deck. At one end of the pool is a fabulous outdoor great room divided into areas for lounging and elegant al-fresco dining. The large sloping entry pool runs almost the entire length of the terrace. At the opposite side of the terrace is a plunge pool perfect for children or simply relaxing.

Two bedrooms are on the upper level; one on the lower level. All have ocean views. Each has a relaxed contemporary feel in serene white and dark woods accented with pops of colors. The upper level bedrooms are large and spacious with private seating inside and outside. The lower level bedroom is a large suite with private covered terrace and comfortable indoor lounging. Each bedroom has beautiful spa style bathrooms with tumble marble tiles and large walk in showers; two have outdoor showers; one opens to the garden.

Although secluded, you are close to amenities. You are 2 minutes to the restaurants in Porto Cupecoy; five minutes to the airport and 10 minute to the charming French capital of Marigot with restaurants, shops, historic buildings and the Creole Market. Drive 25 minutes to Grand Case or Philipsburg’s shopping haven.

listing.listing_description:
Designed to maximize the spectacular ocean views, Footprints is a contemporary villa that offers you the best of Barbados. Set on Alleynes Bay Beach on the island’s west-facing Platinum Coast, the five-bedroom villa is boxy in the best way, with several stories of balconies, terraces and floor-to-ceiling windows that open to the water. Listen to the waves roll in from the calming minimalist interiors or use the villa as a base to explore other nearby beaches and golf courses.

Start each day at Footprints with coffee or tea at the shaded al-fresco dining pavilion overlooking the beach. Move to the lounge area on the terrace to read or nap, take a swim in the infinity pool, spend the afternoon on a chaise longue on the lawn or on the beach just beyond and try out local seafood on the barbecue before watching the sunset from the terrace or one of the balconies. The villa even has its own exercise and media rooms, which are air conditioned for your comfort, and the services of a chef, butler and housekeeper are included in your stay.

The villa’s interiors are finished in a neutral palette of white and tan, creating a soothing atmosphere that lets the vibrant greens and blues of the surrounding trees and water be the stars. In spite of the toned-down color scheme, however, Footprints still feels warm and inviting, thanks to natural wood floors, enough classic roll-arm sofas for everyone and organic accents like coral and a leaf-shaped pendant light. The fully equipped, all-white kitchen is both contemporary and charming, with sleek, flat-fronted cabinets and a farmhouse-style table used as a breakfast bar.

The five hotel-worthy bedrooms at Footprints each have a king bed, en-suite bathroom and air conditioning. Many open to balconies or terraces, so you can fall asleep to the sound of the ocean or feel the breeze first thing in the morning. Like the other living areas, the bedrooms use a restrained color scheme and plenty of natural texture for a luxe, layered look that’s still relaxed and beachy.

Though the villa is located on Alleynes Bay Beach, it’s just 1 mile from the beach at Reeds Bay and 3.3 km from Sandy Lane Beach. Golfers will want to book a tee time at Royal Westmoreland Golf Course, just over 3.9 km away, and the Sandy Lane Country Club course, 5.8 km away. Take an afternoon or evening to stroll Holetown, 2.3 km away, Speightstown, 6.1 km away or Bridgetown, 16.1 km away. At the end of your stay, plan on a 31.2 km drive from Footprints to the island’s Grantley Adams International Airport.

Copyright © 2015 Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
The ocean’s sure rhythm and the slight salt tang in the air create part of the aura on this famous pale pink beach. The spacious home and cottage draw from the white heat of the sun, the palest blue of its waters, and deep indigo of its nights, to create an oasis all its own. Dunmore Town is just 5-minutes away, known for great restaurants, bonefishing, and diving. 

At Sea Siren, white and windows are everywhere in the large, airy rooms, all with panoramic views. It is tropically decorated and tranquil throughout. Lush manicured grounds surround a freshwater pool. Porches, patios, and platforms stretch out to the private pink beach, sun-filled sky and azure ocean.  

Entertaining or going out for an evening? It’s easy to arrange for ala carte services like fresh groceries, chef, butler, car service, even childcare. 

Lazy days of al-fresco or catered meals cabana-side, pool-side lounges for leisurely reading or afternoon dozing, tai chi on the dock before the morning’s smoothie, the sheer whimsey of building pink sandcastles, this becomes your world. A masseuse is on-call for complete pampering of body and soul. It’s the perfect spot for unwinding and relaxing and letting time stand still for a while. 

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Built with the perfect view in mind, this luxury villa’s simplistic, yet highly functional modern architecture merges indoor and outdoor spaces to keep focus towards the ocean. Looking out over Anse a Corossol, which is minutes away, you’ll be nearby several world famous beaches, luxury boutiques, fine dining, and the vibrant night life of St. Bart’s capital city.

Dining in is a great option too. With a fully equipped kitchen and breakfast bar, formal dining for eight, and plenty of indoor/outdoor seating, Sasha is a great spot for entertaining guests. The ocean view, barbeque, and infinity pool make the balcony a happening place to be, whether you’re dining alfresco with friends or relaxing in solitude on a sun lounger.

Sasha is beautifully laid out, with sharp clean sight lines and modern wood furnishings to contrast the cutting edge open space design, all of which lend to its subtle sophistication. All of the shared indoor spaces at Sasha flow seamlessly into each other and with doors the entire length of the first floor, the balcony, pool and view of the ocean become an equal part of the whole equation.

The three bedrooms at Sasha are absolutely top of the line. Each room has an ocean view, access to the terrace, an ensuite bathroom with a rain shower, queen size bed, and satellite television. The master bedroom also has a walk-in closet, dual vanities, and floor to ceiling windows. The other rooms both feature their own private terraces.

St. Bart’s is steeped in historical sites, monuments, museums, and so much more. The architecture is like no place else on earth due to the unique mixing of the French, British, Swedish, and Spanish regimes that once colonized this now French territory. So head for Corossol - you’ll have the perfect Caribbean vacation at Villa Sasha.

listing.listing_description:
No. 6, Firefly, set privately in the Old Trees development is the quintessential tropical retreat. Taking up an entire floor, Firefly features magnificent views overlooking the turquoise waters and sandy beach of exceptional Paynes Bay.

This extremely spacious and impeccably finished apartment features two expansive covered terraces overlooking Paynes Beach and the sparkling Caribbean Sea. Firefly has been created out of two apartments and effectively covers the entire first floor of the North building. This arrangement ensures extremely spacious living and complete privacy.

Firefly is reached by elevator to the first floor. As you enter through the main doors the opulence of the apartment becomes apparent as the space is dominated by a striking coral stonewall illuminated with twinkling lights, vaulted pickled ceilings and warm recessed lighting. The generously proportioned living space opens out and offers multiple tastefully furnished seating options. This airy space is easily able to accommodate a black grand piano, while all around you are spectacular views of the Caribbean and perfect cloudless skies. It’s another day in paradise and Firefly gives you the perfect base from which to enjoy it. Set back from the living area is the well equipped galley-style kitchen lavishly finished with marble walls, clean lines of cabinetry and stainless steel appliances.

Firefly has ample outdoor spaces for you to enjoy, with two separate spacious terraces. The first features a generous plunge pool, two sun beds and private stairway leading you to the lush, tropical communal gardens with freeform swimming pool and waterfall. From here you can easily meander on to the golden sands of Payne’s Bay Beach for more private lounging options including sun chairs, umbrellas and beach butler service. The second terrace is equipped with a bar and splendid marble stone dining table which seats up to 14. Staff services are on hand to maximise your comfort and include housekeeper, cook, on-site Villa Manager and Concierge.

Firefly features five sumptuously appointed bedrooms all with en-suites, ceiling fans and air conditioning. The Master bedroom and Bedroom two and three are located to the left of the apartment. 

Firefly is well positioned to enjoy the many amenities in the local area. It is just 2.4 km to Holetown with supermarket, restaurants, shopping and nightlife, 3.7 km to Sandy Lane - Country Club Golf Course and 10.4 km to Bridgetown. Grantley Adams International Airport (BGI) is just 25.3 km away.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Old Hollywood glamour infuses this corner-suite retreat high above the ocean in South Beach. White floors and sofas and espresso-toned cabinets are a sleek backdrop for whimsical metallic accents—see if you can find the golden pig balanced on a shelf. While there are pools, bars, and beach chairs aplenty at the W Southi Beach, walk to shops, eateries, and happy hour on lively Lincoln Road.

Start the day with a coffee and ocean views on the villa’s shaded private balcony, then challenge friends and family on the tennis and basketball courts, claim a lounge chair by the hotel pool, or walk out to the white-sand beach and order a cold drink. In the evenings, watch one of the LCD TVs or share holiday photos to your feeds via Wi-Fi.

Enjoy the views from the 12th floor in a great room that faces northeast, following the curve of the beach around the bay. White floors, walls, and seating are paired with dark accent tables for a dramatic contrast in the living and dining areas. In the fully equipped kitchen, a golden banana bowl turns fresh fruit into art. 

More than 1,900 square feet of space at this luxury property includes three bedrooms with king beds, en-suite bathrooms, balconies, and ocean views. Two of the bedrooms are honeymoon-worthy hideaways with their own lounge areas.

A location at the W Hotel gives you immediate access to classic Chinese cuisine at Mr Chow, retro board games over drinks at the Living Room Bar, and creative tropical cocktails at Irma’s beach bar. Walk to Lincoln Road for more than 200 shops and eateries featuring everything from American dishes made with Florida produce to pizza, poke, tapas, and tacos.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Floor-to-ceiling, corner-to-corner windows align with the rows of beach chairs below this corner suite in South Beach. A white Eames lounger parked in front of the glass sets the tone for this residence: cool, collected, and modern. Go downstairs for a tea-inspired spa treatment and Asian flavors under a retractable roof at the Setai’s spa and restaurant, and walk to white-sand Miami Beach. 

Start holiday mornings with a cup from the Nespresso machine or a fresh-squeezed Florida orange juice on the private balcony. A cable TV and Wi-Fi keep you connected, while central air conditioning and heating keep you comfortable. Guests of this vacation rental are welcome at the hotel’s pools, hot tubs, fitness center, and on the beach area. 

Glass lines the great room for ocean views from the living area, dining area, and fully equipped kitchen. The sofa and lounger are tucked into the corner for the best beach vistas, while a round marble dining table encourages catching up with friends and family. Honey-colored cabinets in the kitchen echo the warm tones of the Eames lounger across the room, giving the space a considered feel. 

This luxury property has two bedrooms: a honeymoon-worthy master suite with a king bed, jetted tub, and desk area, and a second bedroom with a queen bed. Both bedrooms have en-suite bathrooms and ocean views. 

The Setai’s beachfront setting means you’re a 5-minute walk or less from a nap in a cabana on Miami Beach, the first hole of the Miami Beach Golf Club, and the camera-ready architecture and restaurants around Collins Park. Spend the day getting inspired by the public art—and tempted by the world-class boutiques—in the Miami Design District, then catch a basketball game or concert in the evening at American Airlines Arena. 

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Look out over the white sands of Babalua Beach, the protected shores and cays of Princess Alexandra National Park and the turquoise waters over the barrier reef from Beach Enclave Beachfront Villa 1 - 5 Bedroom. This luxury vacation rental has gorgeous views, pristine contemporary interiors and a location on the exclusive International Drive neighborhood cul-de-sac just minutes from Grace Bay. The five bedrooms let you enjoy the sunshine and scenery of Turks and Caicos with up to ten friends and family.

Your holiday at Beachfront Villa 1 includes the services of a property manager, concierge and butler, as well as daily continental breakfast and Beach Enclave group yoga sessions. The villa has its own private oceanfront terrace with a variety of sunny and covered sitting and lounging areas around an infinity pool. The covered outdoor kitchen with barbecue and dining area invites lingering into the evening, as does the firepit.

The villa’s sleek, contemporary interiors can be opened to the terrace with wide glass pocket doors, linking the indoor great room to the outdoor living areas and letting in the warm ocean breeze. Gather for a chat on the slipcovered white sofas in the sitting area, on the chic white leather seats at the dining table, or along the breakfast bar in the clean-lined, fully equipped kitchen.

Each of the house’s five bedrooms has an en-suite bathroom and ocean views. There are four with king beds, including two honeymoon-style suites with their own balconies and al-fresco showers, and one with two twin beds. Wall-to-wall windows, high ceilings and beach-inspired tones of tan and blue give the bedrooms a bright, comfortable vibe.

You’ll hardly even need sandals to go from Beachfront Villa 1 down the limestone staircase to the beach. If you’d like to see more of the island’s famed white sands and turquoise water, make the short drive to Grace Bay Beach or Long Bay Beach. It’s also a quick journey to the shops and restaurants of Grace Bay, the fantastic natural scenery of Princess Alexandra National Park and the beautifully landscaped Provo Golf Club.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Soak in the sun at this premiere ultra-modern luxury oceanfront villa located on the island of Providenciales. This private vacation rental sits right at the edge of the clear turquoise waters of Chalk Sound National Marine Park. You will be able to read, swim, tan – or hide from the sun, listen to music and eat outdoors while viewing the ever-changing colors of the renowned clear waters of Turks and Caicos. If you are a more active traveler, feel free to take out the villa’s kayaks while exploring the natural beauty of Chalk Sound.

Step onto the private coral stone patio, an ideal spot for enjoying barbeques and dining alfresco. You can laze around in the many loungers while enjoying a good book, tan or simply take an afternoon nap while the trade wind breezes cool you down. Take a dip any time of day in the infinity swimming pool that sinks into the patio below, overlooking the majestic waters of Chalk Sound. Your reservation includes mid-week housekeeping.

The spacious open concept area includes a living room with modern leather sofas and a 65” flat screen television with cable television, Apple TV and Wii. The open, modern and fully furnished kitchen features stainless steel appliances, a wine refrigerator and granite countertops. The large formal dining table seats ten. Wi-Fi is also available throughout the property. We recommend Villa Capri for a family holiday, a corporate retreat or a special celebration such as a wedding, birthday or anniversary.

Four exquisite bedrooms accommodate up to eight guests at this non-smoking villa. Each bedroom provides a king size bed, an en-suite bathroom and a flat screen television. The master suite includes a dual vanity, a large soaking tub and a stand-up rain shower. The villa also has an additional powder room for your convenience. Complimentary luxury toiletries are included.

Feeling adventurous? Take a plunge from the deck into the waters below and go for a swim or snorkeling quest. Or take the two minute drive to Sapodilla Bay Beach, Taylor Bay Beach and Las Brisas Restaurant. Golf aficionado? Book a tee off time at nearby Provo Golf Club. Step into a tranquil tropical haven far away from the hustle and bustle of the daily grind – have your vacation, your way!

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Stunning views and an exclusive location make Hesperides House a Caribbean idyll. This oceanfront Turks and Caicos vacation rental was named for the nymphs of sunset, who tended a beautiful garden, and will remind you of that Greek myth with its lush tropical landscaping and the crystal clear water that laps at the yard. Invite up to ten friends or family members to this five-bedroom luxury property for an unforgettable beach holiday.

The plans for this gorgeous contemporary home, drawn up by acclaimed Coast Architects, call for 4,000 square feet of indoor living space—and an equal amount outdoors. Take in views across Caicos Bank to West Harbour Point and Frenchman’s Creek Nature Preserve from the infinity pool, a pergola-covered daybed, the loungers on the pool terrace or a row of Adirondack chairs on a deck closer to the water. Rinse off in the al-fresco shower, heat up the barbecue and enjoy an evening around the outdoor dining table and firepit.

Hesperides House is laid out in three distinct sections, giving each one a private feel. The main pavilion features an L-shaped great room with a living area, dining area and fully equipped kitchen under an airy vaulted ceiling. A separate library with a home theater system is a more intimate space for watching TV or listening to the Sonos sound system.

Each of the five bedrooms has a king bed, en-suite bathroom and air conditioning, and three of the five have outdoor furniture and open directly to the pool terrace. Like the main living areas, the bedrooms are sleek and contemporary, with clean-lined furniture, blond-wood accents and bedding in shades of white and turquoise that echo the brilliant colors of the sea outside.

The villa is tucked behind the gates of the exclusive Silly Creek Estates on the southwestern shore of Providenciales. Take a few steps beyond the patio to swim, snorkel or kayak right in front of the villa, or bring young children to the wading beach on Silly Creek in back of the house. The location at the edge of Chalk Sound National Park also puts you close to miles of deserted shoreline and beaches, perfect for exploring by paddleboard or taking a honeymoon-style stroll. There are several other world-class beaches within a short drive, including Taylor Bay and Sapodilla Bay, and plenty of dining options as well.

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.

listing.listing_description:
Please note that this villa is near a construction project, however disruption is minimal and there is an acre of land between the 2 sites. There will be no construction between 21 Dec and 4 Jan. Please inquire for more information.

Inspired by its incredible natural surroundings, UXUE (pronounced ooh-SHOO-eh) stands for tranquility, adventure, style and panache.”

This ultra modern, 3-storey villa is nestled into a prime parcel of beachfront property that is consciously built to enhance the surrounding flora and fauna. Mahogany shading louvres shelter the front door. Pops of chrome and slate hues punctuate the minimally designed interior. Grab a paddleboard or kayak and head out for a peaceful excursion along the crystal clear shorelines of Turks & Caicos.

Floor to ceiling glass walls allow the interior to seamlessly melt into the horizon, creating an illusion of endless space. The plush, circular couch in the living room is the perfect spot to sip a morning coffee. Outside, the cerulean, lava stone infinity pool looks out over rippling waves and invites you to make a splash. A spiral staircase leads guests to the main floor of the house. Sleek black cabinets combined with stainless steel appliances in the open-concept chef kitchen exude state-of-the-art luxury. At the end of the day, settle onto the plump sectional sofa in the media room and watch a favourite movie or grab a book from the library. 

Staggered, groyne-like walls offer protection from the elements while enhancing the wide, turquoise sea views. An eco-friendly, ipe timber pathway leads to a vast sundeck, outdoor fire pit, and private beach access. Long Bay Beach is one of the world’s best kiteboarding locations, offering tranquility and a chance to appreciate nature’s beauty. On a day trip, seek out souvenirs in local shops, taste the island’s freshest cuisine, and sail through the deep blue waters. 

Copyright © Luxury Retreats. All rights reserved.
